OOC: Although I'm not exactly doing anything to help this RPG, I've been ex=
tremely loyal to it. I've been subscribed to it for well over a year, and w=
ill be with it through thick and thin, bad times and good, for until it's d=
emise. If this RPG is around another 8 years, I'm around another 8 years. L=
et's keep it going, there's alot of legacy behind it...

essage -----
